<mat-form-field class="custom-field" hideRequiredMarker="true" appearance="outline">
  <mat-label></mat-label>
  <mat-select [formControl]="prodControl" required>
    <mat-option *ngFor="let prod of products; trackBy: prod.id" [value]="prod.id">
      {{ prod.name }}
    </mat-option>
  </mat-select>

  <button *ngIf="prodControl.value" mat-icon-button matSuffix class="clear-button" (click)="clearSelection($event)" aria-label="Clear selection">
    <mat-icon>clear</mat-icon>
  </button>

  <mat-error *ngIf="prodControl.hasError('required')">Selecione um produto</mat-error>
</mat-form-field>
